show_name: Armored Trooper Votoms: The Heretic Saint (OAV)
other_title: Sōkō Kihei VOTOMS: Kakuyaku taru Itan (Japanese)
装甲騎兵ボトムズ 赫奕たる異端 (Japanese)
plot: Chirico is awoken from cold sleep and separated from Fyana. His attempts to find her come to the attention of a Nextant, the replacement for the Perfect Soldier program. At the same time, the new Pope is to be nominated, and Chirico is religiously considered to be "The Untouchable". With one of the nominees related to the Nextant, Chirico's actions will have far-reaching political ramifications.
opening_theme: "Kaze ga Shitte iru (風が知っている; The Winds Knows)" by Shinya Iguchi
ending_theme: "Yume no Kagi (夢の鍵; Key of Dream)" by Shinya Iguchi
